name: No Service
description:
Welcome to No Service! In this game, you play as a cube who is being chased. Unfortunately for you, you don't have any service to call for help! However, there are cell areas where you can store up cell service and make the call!

Collect service while still evading the enemies. 

Play in Fullscreen with WASD.

Made in 2 days for the Area of Effect game jam.

Credits: 

SFX by mr_studders

Music by Meyem

Lots of tech help by a ton of people on the Area of Effect discord server and Unity Answers. I can't list them all, but I am extremely thankful for them :) 

Heavily edited MiniMap asset by Zayed Upal

Heavily modified Health Bars asset by Spike

You for actually reading this far and playing this game :D thank you
